column5: NAH, I think I'll pass. Now where's me rum?
we could use a few days of that
Cant believe I haven't used my rod for about 3 weeks.  I'm dieing to use my new Lawrence Ice fish finder.

NAH, I think I'll pass. Now where's me rum?   Thats a tad cold for me thanks. we could use a few days of that Bite your tongue!!!!  Cant believe I haven't used my rod for about 3 weeks.  I'm dieing to use my new Lawrence Ice fish finder. Plan on slippin into the soft stuff at least once over the next few days but dont see many opportunities after that.
we could use a few days of that  We really could! last year at this time we were on the ice already!
I'm off for the holidays and getting really restless, all the gear is ready to go , but even Haliburton area is still sketchy!!!
Dave,you get your butt out there. Your making us all here feel bad. Dang you.
Is that pic from your Florida trip?  LMAO........
Perfect ice fishing weather... makes me want to head North!

I'm off for the holidays and getting really restless, all the gear is ready to go , but even Haliburton area is still sketchy!!!  Same, was hoping to get up to my buddies by Bracebridge and North Bay...hopefully it wont be sketchy for long!
Is that pic from your Florida trip?  LMAO........   Looks like dry wall sanding dust.
Looks like dry wall sanding dust.  Nope, t'was frost and snow last year at this time when I just finished blowing snow off the driveway.
Not sure what you mean since those 2 towns are about 2 hours away from each other, but NB has had good ice for almost 3 weeks on most lakes, just not much snow.

Not sure what you mean since those 2 towns are about 2 hours away from each other, but NB has had good ice for almost 3 weeks on most lakes, just not much snow.  lol, I meant two separate trips, one to each one of my friends, that could have been specified more legibly, my bad!... It was a rather poorly worded sentence, but come-on I know they are not particularly close to each other lol I know N.B has safe ice now, but it was during the middle of the warm spell here in the south - I know hut operators are reporting 4"+ of ice on Nipissing, I suppose my worry came from whether that was going to stay that way or not
